org.crealytics.controller

Class FrontController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.crealytics.controller.FrontController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
public class FrontController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController is a webservices provider. It exposes several reporting APIs, which can be consumed by client over HTTP(s) Since it's a spring based component stereotype therefore it automatically get prepared and injected.

    • Method Detail

      • reports

        @RequestMapping(value="/report",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AdDetailReport> reports(@RequestParam(value="month")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String month,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="site",required=false)
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String site)
                                                                                                                               throws AppException
        reports(String, String) supports /api/report. This api server 2 purpose
        • Serves as month-site detail reporter
        • Serves as month aggregator function, to access this feature client simply need to site parameter from request
        Parameters:
        month - which month detail required (mandatory)
        site - which site detail required (optional)
        Returns:
        Addetail response
        Throws:
        AppException - Bad_request or internal error. This error are caught and comprehensively sent by RestExceptionHandler

      • reportsAsList

        @RequestMapping(value="/report/list",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<AdDetailReport>> reportsAsList(@RequestParam(value="month")
                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String month,
                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="site",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String site)
                                                                                                                                                          throws AppException
        reportsAsList(String, String) } supports /api/report/list. This api is similiar to reports(String, String) only difference is it doesn't clubs the entries rather sends them as json array This api server 2 purpose:
        • Serves as month-site detail reporter
        • Serves as month aggregator function, to access this feature client simply need to site parameter from request
        Parameters:
        month - which month detail required (mandatory)
        site - which site detail required (optional)
        Returns:
        list AdDetils
        Throws:
        AppException - Bad_request or internal error. This error are caught and comprehensively sent by RestExceptionHandler
